Useful Blogs

  • AI Junkie - a blog about Artificial Intellingence
  • Deep Learning Blog by Tim Dettmers - Making deep learning accessible
  • J Alammar's Blog- Blog posts about Machine Learning and Neural Nets
  • Adam Geitgey - Easiest Introduction to machine learning
  • Ethen's Notebook Collection (⭐3.3k) - Continuously updated machine learning documentations (mainly in Python3). Contents include educational implementation of machine learning algorithms from scratch and open-source library usage
